data.title: Edward Scissorhands - About The Movie
data.meta_description: Edward Scissorhands - about the movie - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document provides details about the 1990 film Edward Scissorhands, directed by Tim Burton. It describes the plot, in which an unfinished man named Edward is taken in by a suburban family and falls in love with their daughter, despite having scissors for hands. It discusses the casting of Johnny Depp as Edward and Winona Ryder as Kim Boggs. It outlines aspects of the film's production, development, and music composition by Danny Elfman. Edward Scissorhands was a critical and financial success for Burton and received several award nominations.
